import React from 'react' import { useParams, useHistory, NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import SideLeft from "./SideLeft" import SideRight from "./SideRight" function SingleVerbList() { const { singleVerbList } = useParams() const verbValue = singleVerbList.split("-").reverse()[0].split(".")[0] return (

List of the verb starting by {`'${verbValue.toUpperCase()}'`}

) } export default SingleVerbList
